beehivetooltip.title: Beehive Tooltip
beehivetooltip.option.healthdisplay.desc: Controls how the health is displayed
beehivetooltip.option.displaymode.descri:
Controls how the tooltip is displayed.
 COMPACT - display only count of the bees
 EXTENDED - display the bees with their custom names (if they have one)
beehivetooltip.extended.title: Contains:
